creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Man in full view, wearing a wide rimmed hat and long pants; he faces forward in a chair; his body turned slightly; a cigarette in his PR hand; three sparrows at his feet; the words "July Among Sparrows" inscribed, UC; predominant colors: blue, grey and yellow
medium: Lithograph with hand-coloring on handmade paper
title: Study for "July Among Sparrows", from the Portfolio "Lilacs and Smoke"
